name: External Backup (WebDAV)
description: Automatically backup your ChurchCRM database to external cloud storage via WebDAV. Supports services like Nextcloud, ownCloud, and other WebDAV-compatible storage.
author: ChurchCRM Team

settings.label: WebDAV Endpoint URL
settings.help: Full WebDAV folder URL starting with https://. Example: https://cloud.example.com/remote.php/dav/files/username/ChurchCRM-Backups/

settings.label: Scheduled Backup Interval (hours)
settings.help: Hours between automatic scheduled backups. Leave empty for manual backups only. Recommended: 24 (daily) or 168 (weekly).
